data.content:
Kled (Count Kledula)

RP: 1350 | Release Date: October 2021

The League of Legends universe is filled with unique and captivating champions, each with their own stories and appearances. One such champion is Kled, a yordle who is known for his fearless and aggressive nature. Kled has recently received a new skin called

which adds a touch of darkness and mystery to his already eccentric personality. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Kled's Count Kledula costume and explore all the intricate details of this skin.

Count Kledula is a skin that transforms Kled into a vampire-like creature, complete with a cape, fangs, and a menacing aura. This skin takes inspiration from classic vampire lore, with Kled embodying the essence of a bloodthirsty and powerful vampire lord. The skin features a dark color palette, with shades of black, red, and purple dominating the design. Kled's mount, Skaarl, also receives a makeover, turning into a fearsome undead steed with glowing red eyes and a skeletal appearance.

The attention to detail in Count Kledula is truly remarkable. Kled's armor is adorned with intricate patterns and engravings, giving him an air of nobility and sophistication. His weapon, a massive axe, is now imbued with dark magic, pulsating with an eerie glow. The skin also introduces new visual effects, such as blood-red trails when Kled charges into battle and a haunting mist that surrounds him during his ultimate ability, Chaaaaaaaarge!!!. Additionally, Count Kledula features unique recall animations, where Kled transforms into a bat and flies away before returning to the battlefield.

Now, let's take a moment to explore the story of Kled and his place in the League of Legends universe. Kled is a yordle from the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving region known for its icy landscapes. He is a fearless and unpredictable warrior, always seeking out battles and challenges. Kled's past is shrouded in mystery, with conflicting tales of his origins. Some say he was a war hero, while others believe he was simply a delusional yordle who stumbled upon a suit of armor and declared himself a champion.

In the game, Kled is classified as a melee bruiser and is known for his high damage output and durability. His passive ability, Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard, grants him a mount named Skaarl, which provides additional health and unique abilities. Kled's Q ability, Beartrap on a Rope, allows him to throw a bear trap that damages and immobilizes enemies. His W ability, Violent Tendencies, enhances his basic attacks, making them deal bonus damage. Kled's E ability, Jousting, enables him to dash towards enemies, damaging and knocking them back. Finally, his ultimate ability, Chaaaaaaaarge!!!, allows him to charge forward on Skaarl, damaging and knocking up enemies in his path.

Kled's playstyle revolves around aggressive and relentless engagements. He excels in skirmishes and team fights, diving into the enemy backline and disrupting their formation. His ability to mount and dismount Skaarl adds an interesting dynamic to his gameplay, as he becomes more vulnerable when dismounted but gains additional mobility and damage when mounted. Kled's unique personality and voice lines make him a fan-favorite champion, with players enjoying his eccentric and humorous nature.

If you want to explore all the appearances of Kled, including the Count Kledula skin, you can find more information and videos on the official League of Legends website. Whether you prefer the classic Kled look or want to embrace the darkness with Count Kledula, there is no shortage of options to suit your playstyle and aesthetic preferences.

In conclusion, Count Kledula is a captivating skin that adds a touch of darkness and mystery to Kled's already eccentric personality. With its intricate design, unique visual effects, and attention to detail, this skin is a must-have for any Kled enthusiast. Whether you're charging into battle on Skaarl or transforming into a bat during recall, Count Kledula is sure to make a lasting impression on both your enemies and allies. So, embrace the darkness and unleash your inner vampire lord with Count Kledula!

Kled (Sir Kled)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: August 10, 2017

Kled, the cantankerous yordle cavalier, has always been known for his wild and unpredictable nature. With his trusty steed, Skaarl, by his side, he charges into battle with reckless abandon. However, there are times when even Kled feels the need to don a more refined and distinguished appearance. Enter Sir Kled, a skin that transforms the rowdy yordle into a noble knight.

Sir Kled is a 1350 RP skin that was released on August 10, 2017. It offers players a chance to see Kled in a completely different light, showcasing his ability to adapt to any situation, even one that requires a more sophisticated demeanor. This skin not only changes Kled's appearance but also adds new animations, sound effects, and voice lines, making it a truly immersive experience for players.

With Sir Kled, Kled trades in his usual ragged armor for a suit of shining silver plate, complete with a regal cape and a plumed helmet. Skaarl, too, receives a makeover, donning a suit of armor that matches Kled's. The duo looks ready to charge into battle, but this time, with a touch of elegance and class.

One of the standout features of Sir Kled is the attention to detail in the skin's animations. Kled's abilities have been reimagined to fit his new knightly persona. For example, his Q ability, Beartrap on a Rope, now features a golden chain instead of a rope, adding a touch of luxury to his attacks. Additionally, his W ability, Violent Tendencies, showcases Kled's refined swordsmanship, with each strike exuding grace and precision.

Furthermore, Sir Kled's voice lines have been updated to reflect his newfound nobility. He speaks with a refined accent, using more formal language and displaying a sense of chivalry. His interactions with Skaarl also change, with the two engaging in banter that highlights their unique bond.

Now, let's delve into the story of Kled and his place in the League of Legends universe. Kled is a yordle from the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land. He is known for his ferocity and his unwavering loyalty to Noxus. Kled's past is shrouded in mystery, but it is believed that he has fought in countless battles, always emerging victorious despite overwhelming odds.

In the game, Kled is a top lane champion who excels at diving into the enemy team and disrupting their formation. His passive ability, Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard, allows him to remount Skaarl after losing all his health, giving him a second chance to continue the fight. Kled's Q ability, Beartrap on a Rope, is a skillshot that damages and immobilizes enemies, making it a powerful tool for engaging or disengaging. His W ability, Violent Tendencies, grants him bonus attack speed and causes his fourth attack to deal bonus damage. This ability synergizes well with Kled's playstyle, allowing him to quickly burst down enemies. Kled's E ability, Jousting, is a dash that deals damage and marks enemies, making them vulnerable to his Q ability. Finally, Kled's ultimate ability, Chaaaaaaaarge!!!, allows him to charge forward, knocking up and damaging enemies in his path.

Kled's unique playstyle and his ability to turn the tide of battles make him a popular pick among players. His aggressive nature and his never-back-down attitude make him a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. Whether he's charging headfirst into battle on Skaarl or donning the regal armor of Sir Kled, Kled is a champion that demands attention.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Kled's appearances, including his base skin and other available skins. Explore the different facets of Kled's character and discover the many ways you can unleash chaos on the Rift with this fearless yordle.

Kled: The Cantankerous Cavalier

Release Date: August 10, 2016

Introducing Kled, the Cantankerous Cavalier, a fearless yordle warrior who charges into battle atop his trusty steed, Skaarl. With his fiery personality and unyielding determination, Kled is a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. In this article, we will delve into Kled's story, his strengths and weaknesses, his background in the game, and his place in the League of Legends.

Background Story

Kled hails from the war-torn land of Noxus, a nation known for its ruthless military might. He is a yordle, a small and feisty creature, but don't let his size fool you. Kled is a fierce and battle-hardened warrior who has fought in countless conflicts throughout his life.

Legend has it that Kled was once a respected member of the Noxian Reckoners, an elite group of soldiers known for their unwavering loyalty to the empire. However, his unpredictable and volatile nature eventually led to his expulsion from the Reckoners. Undeterred, Kled continued to fight on his own terms, becoming a legendary figure in Noxian folklore.

One of Kled's defining characteristics is his unbreakable bond with his loyal mount, Skaarl. Skaarl is a massive, lizard-like creature who shares Kled's love for battle. Together, they form an unstoppable duo, charging headfirst into any conflict that comes their way.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Kled's kit is designed to make him a formidable duelist and a disruptive force in team fights. His passive ability,

grants him a health bar separate from his own, effectively giving him a second life in battle. When Kled's health is depleted, he dismounts from Skaarl, becoming more vulnerable but gaining increased mobility and attack speed.

One of Kled's greatest strengths is his ability to engage and lock down enemies with his Q ability,

This skill allows him to throw a beartrap forward, damaging and rooting the first enemy hit. It provides Kled with a reliable initiation tool and sets up opportunities for his team to follow up with additional crowd control or damage.

Kled's W ability,

enhances his basic attacks, causing them to deal bonus damage and grant him increased attack speed. This ability synergizes well with his Q, allowing him to quickly burst down enemies in close-quarters combat.

His E ability,

is a versatile tool that allows Kled to dash towards a target, dealing damage and applying a slow. This ability can be used both offensively and defensively, enabling Kled to engage or disengage from fights as needed.

Finally, Kled's ultimate ability,

epitomizes his aggressive playstyle. He and Skaarl charge forward, dealing damage to all enemies in their path and knocking them aside. This ability can be a game-changer in team fights, disrupting the enemy team's positioning and allowing Kled's allies to follow up with devastating attacks.

However, Kled is not without his weaknesses. His reliance on Skaarl's health bar means that he can be vulnerable when dismounted, as his base health pool is significantly lower. Additionally, Kled's abilities have relatively high cooldowns, making proper ability management crucial for success. Players must carefully choose their engagements and time their abilities effectively to maximize Kled's impact in fights.

Kled in the League of Legends

Kled's unique playstyle and charismatic personality have made him a fan-favorite champion in the League of Legends. His aggressive nature and unwavering determination resonate with players who enjoy diving headfirst into battles and wreaking havoc on the enemy team.

In the game, Kled is primarily played in the top lane, where his dueling potential and ability to snowball can be fully utilized. His strong laning phase and ability to roam make him a formidable split-pusher and a threat in team fights. Kled's disruptive ultimate can turn the tide of battles, allowing his team to secure objectives or catch out unsuspecting enemies.

As with any champion, mastering Kled requires practice and understanding of his kit. Learning when to engage, how to manage Skaarl's health, and when to dismount strategically are key aspects of playing Kled effectively. With experience, players can unleash Kled's full potential and dominate the battlefield.

On our website, you can find detailed information and videos showcasing all of Kled's skins. From the classic
to the whimsical

each skin offers a unique visual and thematic experience for players to enjoy.

So saddle up, summoners, and join Kled on his wild adventures in the League of Legends. With his indomitable spirit and unyielding determination, Kled is ready to charge into battle and leave a trail of chaos in his wake.

Kled (Default)

RP Cost: N/A

Release Date: N/A

Kled, the Cantankerous Cavalier, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his fiery personality and fearless nature, Kled is a yordle who rides into battle on his trusty steed, Skaarl. While Kled has several skins available, his default costume is the one that represents his true essence and character. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Kled's default skin and explore all the intricate details of this iconic costume.

The Story of Kled's Default Costume

Kled's default costume showcases his rugged and battle-hardened appearance. He is depicted as a diminutive yordle with a fierce expression, wearing a tattered red cape and a metal helmet adorned with horns. His armor is a mishmash of various pieces, reflecting his resourcefulness and unconventional approach to combat. Kled wields a massive, serrated blade known as

which he uses to strike fear into the hearts of his enemies.

The default skin perfectly captures Kled's personality and backstory. As a warrior from Noxus, Kled has fought in countless battles and has a reputation for being unpredictable and relentless. His appearance reflects his rough and unrefined nature, with scars and battle wounds visible on his face and body. Kled's default costume embodies his tenacity and refusal to back down from any fight, no matter how daunting the odds may be.

Kled's Story and Abilities

Kled's story within the League of Legends universe is as captivating as his appearance. He hails from the war-torn land of Noxus, where strength and power are highly valued. Kled, however, stands out even among his fellow Noxians due to his unyielding spirit and his unwavering loyalty to his trusty mount, Skaarl. Together, they form an unstoppable duo on the battlefield.

Kled's abilities in the game reflect his aggressive and relentless playstyle. His passive ability,
allows him to remount Skaarl after a short period of time, ensuring that he never stays out of the fight for too long. His Q ability,
throws a beartrap forward, damaging and rooting enemies in its path. Kled's W ability,
grants him increased attack speed and bonus damage on every fourth hit. His E ability,
allows him to dash towards enemies, dealing damage and gaining a short burst of movement speed. Finally, his ultimate ability,

sends Kled and Skaarl charging forward, damaging and knocking up enemies in their path.

Kled's strengths lie in his ability to engage and disrupt the enemy team. With his high mobility and crowd control abilities, he excels at catching opponents off guard and initiating team fights. His relentless nature also makes him a formidable split-pusher, capable of pressuring multiple lanes simultaneously. However, Kled's aggressive playstyle leaves him vulnerable to crowd control and burst damage. Additionally, his reliance on remounting Skaarl can make him a target for coordinated enemy teams who aim to keep him dismounted and unable to participate fully in fights.

Kled's Place in the Game

Kled's unique playstyle and personality have made him a fan-favorite champion in League of Legends. His aggressive nature and quirky voice lines have endeared him to players around the world. In the game, Kled is often played in the top lane, where his dueling potential and ability to snowball can quickly turn the tide of a match. His ability to roam and make plays across the map also makes him a valuable asset in coordinated team play.

If you're interested in learning more about Kled and his various appearances, you can find detailed information and videos on his dedicated page on the League of Legends website. Whether you prefer his default skin or one of his alternate costumes, Kled is a champion who embodies the spirit of never backing down and always charging headfirst into battle.

Kled (Kibble-Head Kled)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: August 10, 2017

League of Legends is known for its diverse and imaginative skins, and Kled's

is no exception. This skin, released on August 10, 2017, offers players a unique and comical twist on the already eccentric champion, Kled. Priced at 1350 RP, it is a skin that truly stands out on the battlefield.

The

skin transforms Kled into a hilarious and adorable character. Instead of his usual fierce and battle-hardened appearance, Kled now sports a giant, oversized dog head. Complete with floppy ears, a wagging tongue, and a mischievous grin, this skin adds a touch of whimsy to Kled's otherwise ferocious persona.

One of the most notable features of the

skin is the unique voiceover. Kled's voice is altered to match his new appearance, resulting in a high-pitched and playful tone. His lines are filled with dog-related puns and jokes, adding an extra layer of humor to his already entertaining personality. From barking orders to taunting enemies, Kled's voiceover is sure to bring a smile to the faces of both players and spectators.

In terms of visual effects, the
skin offers a range of delightful changes. Kled's mount, Skaarl, is transformed into a giant, fluffy dog with a wagging tail. When Kled uses his ultimate ability,

he and Skaarl leave behind a trail of paw prints, emphasizing the playful nature of the skin. Additionally, Kled's abilities are visually enhanced with dog-themed effects, such as bones and chew toys.

Now that we've explored the details of the

skin, let's delve into the story of Kled himself. Kled is a yordle champion known for his unyielding determination and his trusty mount, Skaarl. Hailing from the war-torn land of Noxus, Kled is a fearless warrior who thrives in battle. He is always ready to charge headfirst into any fight, no matter the odds.

Kled's past in the game is filled with tales of his bravery and his unwavering loyalty to Noxus. He has fought in countless battles, often leading his troops into the heart of the enemy lines. Kled's unique ability,

allows him to remount Skaarl after dismounting, ensuring that he never backs down from a fight.

In terms of gameplay, Kled is a top lane champion who excels in duels and skirmishes. His passive ability,
grants him bonus attack speed and enhanced abilities when he is dismounted, making him a formidable opponent even without Skaarl. Kled's Q ability,
allows him to snare enemies and deal damage, while his E ability,

enables him to dash towards enemies and deliver a powerful blow.

However, Kled does have his weaknesses. His reliance on Skaarl makes him vulnerable when dismounted, as he becomes significantly squishier and loses access to some of his abilities. Additionally, Kled's ultimate ability,

can be interrupted by crowd control effects, limiting his engage potential in team fights.

Despite his weaknesses, Kled remains a popular and beloved champion in the League of Legends community. His unique personality, combined with his high-risk, high-reward playstyle, makes him a thrilling and entertaining champion to play. Whether you're charging into battle on Skaarl's back or wreaking havoc as a dismounted yordle, Kled offers a unique and enjoyable gameplay experience.

If you're interested in exploring all of Kled's appearances and learning more about his lore, abilities, and strategies, be sure to check out the League of Legends website. There, you'll find detailed information, videos, and guides to help you master this fearless yordle warrior.

Kled (Marauder Kled)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: February 23, 2017

League of Legends is known for its vast array of champions, each with their own unique abilities and playstyles. One such champion is Kled, a yordle who rides into battle on his trusty steed, Skaarl. Kled is a fearless and unpredictable warrior, always ready to charge headfirst into the fray. With his Marauder Kled skin, he takes on a new look that strikes fear into the hearts of his enemies.

The Marauder Kled skin was released on February 23, 2017, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 1350 RP. This skin transforms Kled into a fearsome marauder, clad in rugged armor and wielding a menacing weapon. The skin features new visual effects, animations, and sound effects, giving Kled a fresh and exciting look on the battlefield.

As a marauder, Kled embodies the spirit of chaos and mayhem. His armor is adorned with spikes and his weapon is sharp and deadly. The skin showcases Kled's wild and unpredictable nature, making him an even more intimidating presence on the battlefield.

But what is the story behind this fearsome marauder? To understand the origins of Marauder Kled, we must delve into Kled's own backstory. Kled hails from the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land known for its brutal winters and warring tribes. He is a member of the Noxian Reckoners, a group of elite warriors who serve the Noxian empire.

Kled's past is shrouded in mystery, but one thing is certain - he is a force to be reckoned with. He has fought in countless battles, always emerging victorious despite overwhelming odds. Kled's ferocity and tenacity have earned him a fearsome reputation, and his enemies know better than to underestimate him.

In the game, Kled is classified as a melee fighter, excelling in close-quarters combat. His abilities allow him to charge into battle, dealing damage to multiple enemies at once. His passive ability, Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard, grants him a mount that provides additional health and unique abilities. When Kled's health is depleted, he dismounts from Skaarl and becomes more vulnerable, but gains access to a new set of abilities.

Kled's strengths lie in his ability to engage and disrupt the enemy team. With his ultimate ability, Chaaaaaaaarge!!!, he can charge into battle, knocking up and damaging enemies in his path. This makes him a valuable asset in team fights, as he can initiate fights and create opportunities for his team to follow up.

However, Kled also has his weaknesses. His reliance on Skaarl makes him vulnerable when he is dismounted, as he loses the additional health and mobility provided by his mount. This makes him an easy target for enemies who can quickly burst him down before he has a chance to remount.

Despite his weaknesses, Kled remains a popular pick among players who enjoy his unique playstyle and unpredictable nature. His aggressive and relentless approach to combat makes him a formidable opponent, and his Marauder Kled skin only adds to his intimidating presence.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Kled's appearances, including the Marauder Kled skin. Whether you're a fan of Kled or simply curious about his story, this page is your one-stop destination for all things Kled.
